anger.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

blood_for_blood.description:
Costs 1 less energy for each time you lose HP this combat.
Deal 18 damage.

body_slam.description: Deal damage equal to your Block.

clash.description:
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack.
Deal 14 damage.

drop_kick.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

feed.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 3 permanent Max HP.

fiend_fire.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Deal 7 damage for each exhausted card.

headbutt.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

heavy_blade.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Strength affects Heavy Blade 3 times.

immolate.description:
Deal 21 damage to ALL enemies.
Add a Burn to your discard pile.

perfected_strike.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deals 2 additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike".

rampage.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Increases this card's damage by 5 this combat.

reaper.description:
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Heal for unblocked damage dealt.

reckless_charge.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable to yourself.

searing_blow.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

sever_soul.description:
Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand.
Deal 12 damage.

sword_boomerang.description: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3 times.

thunder_clap.description: Deal 4 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

uppercut.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Apply 1 Vulnerable and 1 Weak.

whirlwind.description: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies X times.

wild_strike.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.

Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

Draw 3 cards.

exhume.description: Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
